mapper.select: select a.*,b.name as senderName,b.account as senderAccount,b.avatar as senderAvatar from packet a, user b where a.id=#{id} and a.sender=b.id
mapper.update: update packet set state=#{state} where id=#{id}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from packetState where packetId=#{packetId}
and reciever=#{reciever}
select a.*,b.name as recieverName,b.account as recieverAccount,b.avatar as recieverAvatar from packetState a, user b where a.packetId=#{packetId} and a.reciever=b.id order by time desc
mapper.insert: insert into packetState(packetId, reciever, amount, time) values(#{packetId},#{reciever},#{amount},#{time})
